偶一.definition: accidentally; once in a while; very occasionally

偶一為之.definition: to do sth once in a while (idiom); to do sth more as an exception than the rule

偶像劇.definition: idol drama; drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers

偶像包袱.definition: burden of having to maintain one's image as a pop idol

偶然.definition: incidentally; occasional; occasionally; by chance; randomly

偶爾.definition: occasionally; once in a while; sometimes

偶見.definition: to happen upon; to see incidentally; occasional; accidental

偶語棄市.definition: chance remarks can lead to public execution (idiom)

偶蹄目.definition: Artiodactyla (even-toed ungulates, such as pigs, cows, giraffes etc)

偶蹄類.definition: Artiodactyla (even-toed ungulates, such as pigs, cows, giraffes etc)
